alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:35AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and western Echols Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1135 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blue Springs, or 9 miles southwest of Jennings, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Statenville, Blue Springs and Mayday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
